Text: while I think totalitarian and 1984 are a bit exaggerated, I am deeply worried about the anti-freedom, anti-civil/constitutional rights laws and practices promoted or tolerated by US elected officials. Our freedoms are in grave danger. Even in better time there have always been individual police/prosecutors/judges willing to ignore or deny our rights if we don't demand them. I encourage all to know their rights and to demand congress stop the abuses and repeal laws like the (anti) patriot acts
